dict.acceptation: 朝一个方向的；到某种状态；关闭；

sent.orig: The speaker said he would confine himself to (try) to (answer) for questions.
sent.trans: trying,answer.又来了哦~~第一个to是介词，第二个to是不定式。

sent.orig: Bank-To-Turn (BTT) and Skid-To-Turn (STT) control techniques are widely used in current missile control systems.
sent.trans: 现代导弹控制技术一般可分为侧滑转弯(Skid-to-Turn,STT)控制技术和倾斜转弯(Bank-to-Tum,BTT)控制技术。

sent.orig: Having suggested the scheme myself, I now feel committed to (try) to (make) it work.
sent.trans: trying,make.第一个to是介词，第二个是to是不定式。

sent.orig: It is the key problem of telecommunication services to improve the end-to-end user experience.
sent.trans: 发展此类业务的一个关键问题是提高端到端(End-to-end)的用户感受(User Experience,或者叫做Quality of Experience)。

sent.orig: "Too" was a slip of the pen; I meant to write" to"
